模块 com.example.BubbleBobble
程序包 com.example.BubbleBobble.Model.Bubble

类 Bubble

java.lang.Object
javafx.scene.Node
com.example.BubbleBobble.GameObject
com.example.BubbleBobble.Model.Bubble.Bubble
所有已实现的接口:
javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget
public class Bubble extends GameObject
The main.Bubble class handles everything with the main.Hero's special ability, named the bubble. It begins at the hero, and grows covering the whole screen. Once it collides with an enemy, that enemy is bubbled. Once hero collides with an enemy in bubbled state, then a fruit will be produced, indicating the enemy is dead. However, if a bubble collides with the boss, the boss will not be in a bubbled state, but deduct its health point instead.
